Welcome to ConsciousInsights!

Leveraging AI to evaluate your mental well being

How it works?

Download the app.
Once a day you can enter
how your day was. An LLM will
evaluate that to a sentiment score.
You can look at a graph of your
well being over the
last 90 days.

Contact

If you have any questions, suggestions, or business
inquiries please contact consciousinsightsai@gmail.com
